info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: Konstrukt™ Trafficshield™ K-402 Concrete Leveling Bond Coat is a product generally used to seal substrates prior to the application of K-406 Rapid Cure Self Leveling Underlayment Compound.

info.title: MATERIAL PREPARATION
info.body: Thoroughly shake the can before use.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Surface should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body:
1. Shake the product well before application.
2. Apply the sealer using a brush or roller, making sure that the product is absorbed by the floor.
3. Wait for 40 to 60 minutes before applying K-406 Rapid Cure Self Leveling Underlayment Compound.
